decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Reasonable Exception Statement; SUPPORTING PERSONAL STATEMENT, PLANNING SUPPORTING STATEMENT, 100 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 100 (Existing First Floor Plan), 103, 104, 102, 105, 106, 97, 99, 050 REV F, 051 REV F

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the east flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The proposed patio doors and new front door together with the proposed extension  hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the occupiers of 31 Hazeldene Drive, Pinner, Harrow, HA5 3NJ and shall at no point be used as self-contained accommodation, rental purposes or any other similar use.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single and two storey front extensions; single and two storey side extensions, single storey side to rear infill extension and rear extension, alterations to main entrance; external alterations (demolition of front extension, attached garage and shed)
